name: Card Card
description:
Weekly Game Jam 61 - Update A Game

Here is my unfinished and unpublished game for weekly game jam 58 (Card Theme), which still looks unfinished :)

This is my first time joining a jam, and just tried out godot to get familiarize

Simple Matching Game of cards

Game Engine: Godot

Arts: Krita

Sounds: opengamart.org

Test it and leave a comment, would gladly appreciate it.

Thanks
